mapper.insert: INSERT into fa_vipintegral_ftp@bojun (ID, AD_CLIENT_ID, AD_ORG_ID, OWNERID, MODIFIERID, CREATIONDATE, MODIFIEDDATE, ISACTIVE, C_VIP_ID, DOCNO, CHANGDATE, AMT_ACTUAL, INTEGRAL, DESCRIPTION, VIP_PAYAMT, INTEGRAL_UP, IFUP_ISUSE, C_VIPINTEGRAL_REASON_ID, JF1, JF2, JF3,activeid) VALUES (#{id}, #{ad_client_id}, #{ad_org_id}, #{ownerid}, #{modifierid}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 'Y', #{c_vip_id}, #{docno}, To_Number(To_Char(Sysdate, 'yyyymmdd')), #{amt_actual}, #{integral}, #{description}, #{vip_payamt}, #{integral}, 'N', '1', #{integral}, '0', '0',#{activeid} )
